description: T3	Weeping Willow 	(Salix alba 'Tristis'/babylonica)- Reduce entire tree back to previous points of reduction.At rear of gardenT4	Copper Beech 	- Reduce the front face of the tree back to previous points which equates to approximately 1-1.5mRearT5	Snakebark Maple 	(Acer capillipes)	- Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction (1-1.5m) to create afar more compact and rounded shapeRHS of T4T6	Purple leaf Plum 	(Prunus cerasifera 'Nigra')	 Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction (2-2.5m) - Clean out the crown- Aim to give some clearance between T4 and T6RHS of T6T7	Plum tree adjacent to T6 - Reduce height to match T6 - clean out the crown- reduce any overlongs to containRearT8	Cherry 	(Prunus spp)	-Reduce overlongs back into the main body and clean out the crownPruning of 2no. Lime trees in the front garden subject to TPO application 2021/02765/TPO.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
